original_title: 春を彩る 華やかな桜のある風景
overview: With the arrival of spring, comes the bloom of flowers ... The warm sunshine and spring breeze, carries the cherry blossoms all over. These beautiful light red flowers are in full bloom throughout Japan, and are a sight like no other in the world.
tagline: Superb spring views in the cherry blossom archipelago
title: Sakura
